description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Airport Anarchy - The Lost Runways is a game where you must complete flights while managing the flow of aircraft to and from the airport. In arcade mode you earn more points the quicker you deal with aircraft, while Endless mode won't finish until there's a crash!
description.short: Airport Anarchy - The Lost Runways is a game where you must complete flights while managing the flow of aircraft to and from the airport. In arcade mode you earn more points the quicker you deal with aircraft, while Endless mode won't finish until there's a crash!
